TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示在数据绑定控件中显示自定义内容的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that displays custom content in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用类 (例如 和 ) 来显示每个显示的记录的自定义内容。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display custom content for each record displayed. 当你需要在未由预定义的数据控件字段（如) ）提供的数据绑定控件中显示内容时 ，请使用 类 ( (UI) 创建自定义用户界面。When you need to display content in a data-bound control that is not provided by one of the predefined data control fields (such as ), use the class to create your custom user interface (UI). 对象的显示方式取决于使用它的数据绑定控件。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件将 对象显示为一列，并且 控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, and the control displays it as a row. 您可以 使用下表中列出的模板为对象的不同部分定义自定义模板。You can define a custom template for the different parts of the object using the templates listed in the following table. |模板Template|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要为对象中的交替项显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for the alternating items in a object.| ||指定要为对象中的编辑模式的项显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for an item in edit mode in a object.| ||为对象的脚注部分指定要显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for the footer section of a object.| ||为对象的标头部分指定要显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for the header section of a object.| ||指定为对象中的插入模式项显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for an item in insert mode in a object. 此模板仅受 控件支持。This template is supported only by the control.| ||指定要为对象中的项显示的内容 。Specifies the content to display for the items in a object.| 可以 通过将属性设置为来隐藏数据绑定控件中的对象 `false` 。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 作为定义自定义或模板的替代方法 ，您可以 通过设置对象的其他属性自定义对象的页眉和页脚部分 。As an alternative to defining a custom or template, you can customize the header and footer sections of a object by setting other properties of the object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请分别设置 或 属性。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or the property, respectively. 您可以通过设置属性来显示图像，而不是在页眉节中显示文本 。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 通过将属性设置为，可以在对象中隐藏标头部分 `false` 。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (例如 控件) 可以仅显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持 单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，请使用控件的 `ShowHeader` 属性 (如有) 。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 还可以 通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性，自定义对象的外观 (字体颜色、背景色等) 。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置 。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||对象的脚注部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||对象的标头部分的样式设置 。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||对象中数据项的样式设置 。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义 对象，该对象在同一单元格中显示两个字段。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom object that displays two fields in the same cell. "名字" 和 "姓氏" 字段合并为同一 对象。The first name and last name fields are combined into the same object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/CS/templatefieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateField/VB/templatefieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将对象动态添加 到数据绑定控件，请创建一个新的 对象，定义适当的模板，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合中。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, define the appropriate templates, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合中。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议根据需要静态声明字段，然后将其显示或隐藏。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数将字段列动态添加 到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/CS/templatefieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldCtor/VB/templatefieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 对象中交替项的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the alternating items in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中交替项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the alternating items in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为对象中的交替项显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the alternating items in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现交替项的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the alternating items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 属性通常与属性结合使用 ，为数据绑定控件中的每个其他项创建不同的外观。The property is commonly used in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件的字段列中的交替项创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the alternating items in a field column of a control. 模板是由属性指定的模板的变体 ，其中图像显示在单元的另一侧。The template is a variation of the template specified by the property, where an image is displayed on the opposite side of the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldAlternatingItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldalternatingitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 对象绑定到的值为 时是否应将其转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value that the object is bound to should be converted to if it is .

value.span: 如果在 绑定到的值为 时应将其转换为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value that the is bound to should be converted to when it is ; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于在模板中进行的双向数据绑定语句。This property applies to two-way data-binding statements made in the template. 在从双向绑定模板提取值后，以及在将值传递到用于更新或插入操作的数据源之前，将执行转换。The conversion is done after extracting the values from the two-way bound template, and before passing the values to the data source for an update or insertion operation. 例如，用户可能会在更新或插入记录时为字段值输入空字符串 ( "" ) 。For example, a user might enter an empty string ("") for a field value when updating or inserting records. 使用 属性可以指定在 `null` 数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值自动转换为。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the data source.

span.span: Copies the properties of the current -derived object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于将当前派生对象的属性复制 到 该方法创建的对象。The method is a helper method used to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object created by the method.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

summary.span: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 对象中处于编辑模式中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中处于编辑模式的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in edit mode in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为对象中处于编辑模式的项显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item that is in edit mode in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现处于编辑模式的项的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how an item in edit mode is rendered. 属性通常包含输入控件，用户可通过这些控件修改数据源中的值。The property usually contains input controls for the user to modify a value in a data source. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件的字段列中处于编辑模式的项创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in edit mode in a field column of a control. 模板包含验证服务器控件，以防止用户将值字段留空。The template contains validation server controls to prevent a user from leaving a value field empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldEditItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从当前表单元格提取由一个或多个双向绑定语句 () 指定的数据控件字段的值，并将这些值添加到指定的 集合。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control fields as specified by one or more two-way binding statements () from the current table cell and adds the values to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由派生自的类型实现 ，如 。The method is implemented by types derived from , such as . 调用此方法可在模板中提取双向数据绑定字段的值，以便为更新、插入或删除操作填充要传递到数据源的字典。This method is called to extract the values of two-way data-bound fields in the template to populate dictionaries to be passed to the data source for an update, insert, or delete operation. 字段/值对存储在传递给方法的字典集合中。The field/value pair is stored in the dictionary collection that is passed to the method. 方法由 `ExtractRowValues` 数据控件（如和）的方法调用 。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定在对象的页脚部分中显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed in the footer section of a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现脚注部分的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the footer section is rendered. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的字段列的脚注部分创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the footer section of a field column in a control. 该模板显示 "字段" 列中的值的总和 。The template displays the sum of the values in the field column. value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为对象的标头部分显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the header section of a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现标头部分的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header section is rendered. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的字段列的标头部分创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the header section of a field column in a control. 该模板将显示一个复选框，允许用户显示或隐藏控件的行 。The template displays a check box that allows the user to show or hide the rows of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/CS/templatefieldheadertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldHeaderTemplate/VB/templatefieldheadertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建一个自定义数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法，该控件使用 对象初始化包含数据或控件的表结构的单元格。Call this method when you are creating a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置模板，该模板用于显示 对象中处于插入模式中的项。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示 中处于插入模式的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying an item in insert mode in a .

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定为对象中的 "插入" 模式下的项显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for an item in insert mode in a object. 通过创建一个模板来定义内容，该模板指定如何呈现处于插入模式的项。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the item in insert mode is rendered. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有数据绑定控件都支持此模板仅允许插入记录的数据绑定控件（如控件）支持此模板 。Not all data-bound controls support this template This template is supported only by data-bound controls that allow you to insert a record, such as the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的字段行中的 "插入" 模式下的项创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for an item in insert mode in a field row in a control. 该模板显示一个 控件，该控件允许用户从预定义列表中选择值。The template displays a control that allows the user to select a value from a predefined list. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/CS/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldInsertItemTemplate/VB/templatefieldinsertitemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定为对象中的项显示的自定义内容 。Use the property to specify the custom content displayed for the items in a object. 通过创建指定如何呈现项的模板来定义内容。Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the items are rendered. > [!NOTE] > 您可以选择将 属性与属性结合使用 ，为数据绑定控件中的每个其他项创建不同的外观。You can optionally define the property in combination with the property to create a different appearance for every other item in the data-bound control. 若要指定模板，请先在 `` 元素的开始标记和结束标记之间放置开始标记和结束标记 `` 。To specify a template, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 接下来，在开始标记和结束标记之间添加自定义内容 `` 。Next, add the custom content between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以与纯文本或更复杂 (嵌入模板中的其他控件一样简单，例如) 。The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example). 若要以编程方式访问在模板中定义的控件，首先要确定 数据绑定控件中包含控件的对象。To programmatically access a control defined in a template, first determine which object in the data-bound control contains the control. 接下来，使用 对象的集合 访问该控件。Next, use the collection of the object to access the control. 如果控件具有指定的属性，则还可以使用对象的方法来查找控件 。You can also use the method of the object to find the control, if the control has an property specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为控件中的字段项创建自定义模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom template for the items of a field in a control. 模板在控件中显示字段的值 。The template displays the field's value in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateFieldItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldItemTemplate/CS/templatefielditemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateFieldItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateFieldItemTemplate/VB/templatefielditemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持页面回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support page callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类不支持此方法，始终引发 异常。The method is not supported for this class and always throws a exception.

exception.span: 调用该方法的默认实现。

span.span: The default implementation of this method is called.

para.span: 从类派生的类 可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
